import React from 'react'; import { Terminal, Layers, Cloud, LayoutTemplate, Lightbulb, ArrowLeft, ArrowRight, CheckCircle2, AlertCircle } from 'lucide-react'; export default function NewProjectSetup() { return (
{/* Background Decoration */}

{/* Main Content Column */}
{/* Stepper Progress */}
{/* Progress Lines */}

1
BASIC INFO
{/* Step 2 (Active) */}
2
TEMPLATES
{/* Step 3 */}
3
MEMBERS
{/* Step 4 */}
4
PERMISSIONS

Project Setup

Step 2: Selection of engineering architecture template

{/* Content Area (Template Selection View) */}
{/* Template Card 1 (Active) */}

Microservices

Distributed system architecture with Docker, K8s, and event-driven communication.

DOCKER GO/NODE
{/* Template Card 2 */}

Serverless API

AWS Lambda/Azure Functions setup with API Gateway and NoSQL storage.

AWS PYTHON
{/* Template Card 3 */}

Clean Monolith

Onion architecture for robust enterprise applications with SQL backend.

DOTNET POSTGRES
{/* Step Preview Information */}

Architecture Recommendation

Based on your project description "High-frequency trade-engine", the Microservices architecture with Kafka-based messaging is recommended for optimal scaling and performance.

{/* Footer Actions */}
{/* Side Panel (Upcoming Steps) */}
Upcoming Steps
3

Team Invitations

Add engineers via email

4

Role Assignment

Define access controls

Region: us-east-1
FACEBRASIL Standard

Compliant with premium architectural governance frameworks.

messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

fix.text: unknown

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.

fix.text: never

suggestions.desc: Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

import React from 'react'; import { Shield, Download, Share2, AlertTriangle, ArrowRight, CheckCircle2, MoreVertical, BrainCircuit, TrendingUp, Clock, Zap, FileText, Settings } from 'lucide-react'; export default function DailyReports() { return (
{/* Navbar */} {/* Navbar removed (handled by DashboardLayout) */}
{/* Header Section */}
System Status: Active

Daily Commander Report

Monday, October 23, 2023 — Sprint Cycle 14

Health Score

92%

Open Blockers

03

{/* Main Content Grid */}
{/* Critical Delays Section */}

Critical Delays

{/* Delay Card 1 */}
High Overdue

API Auth Refactor

Project: Core Services • ID: #ENG-442

3d

Overdue

Marcus Chen
{/* Delay Card 2 */}
Database Migration

Postgres 15 Upgrade

Project: Infrastructure • ID: #OPS-109

2d

Overdue

Sarah Jenkins
{/* Pending Tasks Section */}

Pending for Today

12 TOTAL TASKS
{/* Task 1 */}

Websocket Implementation for Live Logs

High Priority

{/* Task 2 */}

Security Audit - Q4 Preparation

Medium Priority

{/* Task 3 */}

Update Technical Documentation - Module B

Low Priority

{/* Automated Summary */}

Automated Summary

"The team is currently showing a 12% velocity dip compared to the previous sprint. This is largely attributed to the API Authentication blockers currently assigned to Marcus. While today's planned tasks are well-distributed, the technical debt in the infrastructure layer requires immediate attention to prevent a cascade of delays in the next 48 hours."

High Risk: Deployment
Stable: Backend Core
Ahead: Frontend UX
{/* AI Next-Day Insights */}

AI Next-Day Insights

Predictive Analysis Engine v2.4

{/* Insight Col 1 */}

Tomorrow's Bottlenecks

  • CI/CD queue congestion likely during 10:00 AM - 12:00 PM peak merges.

  • Potential code review deadlock on #ENG-442 if Sarah isn't tagged by EOD.

{/* Insight Col 2 */}

Efficiency Optimization

  • Reassign Module B Docs to Alex to free Sarah for Postgres migration.

  • Shift QA verification for Websocket Implementation to tomorrow's early shift.

{/* Insight Col 3 */}

Commander's Strategy

"Focus on 'Force Multiplication' tomorrow. Prioritize clearing Marcus's blockers before any new feature work begins. A 2-hour pair programming session at 0900 hrs will yield a 4x recovery in team velocity."

CALIBRATED FOR SPRINT CYCLE 14

Generated by AI-Dev_Commander Oracle v4.2.0

); }
